name: AnswerHub
description: AnswerHub is a Network Knowledge Platform that enables teams to work together effectively and experience improved operational and financial results.

apis.name: AnswerHub
apis.description: AnswerHub is an enterprise-level Q&A service that helps teams collaborate by eliminating the need to answer redundant questions. It is designed to be mobile-friendly and highly customizable so that it can mesh seamlessly with the rest of a company's website or application. AnswerHub comes with administrative tools for controlling user access, managing content, and performing analytics. AnswerHub's functions can be integrated with other software and systems by using its RESTful API.
